name: Urho3D Sample Application
description:
A sample app built with rbfx fork of Urho3D engine. It demonstrates how to build a .net application and distribute it via itch.io for multiple platforms. The source code includes Azure DevOps yaml files for the CI integration.

Urho3D game engine: https://urho3d.github.io/

rbfx: https://github.com/rokups/rbfx

Source code of the app: https://github.com/gleblebedev/rbfxSample
